reviews.comment: This endpoint for creating trial accounts introduces a significant business logic flaw. It allows any email to be converted to a 'trial' account without any checks to see if that user has already had a trial. Furthermore, it fails to set an expiration date for the trial period. This combination allows users to repeatedly create or switch to trial accounts, effectively bypassing the conversion to a paid plan and leading to service abuse. To mitigate this, the system must validate trial eligibility before creating the account and set a non-nullable expiration date that is enforced by the system.

title: feat: Add free trial signup
body: Allow users to start free trial accounts. See https://github.com/Reviewate/benchmark/issues/153
